data.comment: In the minute -1, A total of 24068 spectators is reported.
The first-half is under way at Gazprom Arena - Saint Petersburg kick-off to start the match.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
In the minute 3, Saint Petersburg's Magomed Ozdoev gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 6, Evgeni Chernov of Krasnodar smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
Vladimir Moskalev signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
In the minute 7, Saint Petersburg drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Krasnodar in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 9, Douglas Santos for Saint Petersburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
Throw-in for Krasnodar close to the penalty box.
In the minute 12, Can Krasnodar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint Petersburg's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Krasnodar capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 13, Wendel is booked for the home team.
Krasnodar have been awarded a penalty in Saint Petersburg...
Goal! Krasnodar take a 0-1 lead thanks to a Marcus Berg spot-kick..
In the minute 19, Throw-in Krasnodar.
Krasnodar's Alexey Ionov has run offside.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Krasnodar.
In the minute 21, Throw-in high up the field for Saint Petersburg in Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg drive forward but Magomed Ozdoev is judged offside.
Vladimir Moskalev awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 22, Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
In Saint Petersburg Saint Petersburg attack through Daler Kuzyaev. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Krasnodar's Shapi Suleymanov breaks free at Gazprom Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Saint Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
Saint Petersburg's Wendel is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 30, Free kick Saint Petersburg.
Marcus Berg (Krasnodar) has received a first yellow card.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 34, Wilmar Barrios for Saint Petersburg drives towards goal at Gazprom Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Saint Petersburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Krasnodar needs to be cautious. Saint Petersburg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 37, Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
In the minute 41, Saint Petersburg have a dangerous throw-in.
An attacking Saint Petersburg player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Artem Dzyuba (Saint Petersburg) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
In the minute 45, Saint Petersburg pushes forward through Artem Dzyuba, whose finish on goal is saved.
At Gazprom Arena the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Marcus Berg (Krasnodar) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 45, Vladimir Moskalev signals a throw-in for Krasnodar, close to Saint Petersburg's area.
Vladimir Moskalev blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway. Krasnodar with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 50, In Saint Petersburg Saint Petersburg drive forward through Artem Dzyuba. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Important block from the Krasnodar defence as Magomed Ozdoev fires in a strike for Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 51, Vladimir Moskalev signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
Vladimir Moskalev awards the away team a throw-in.
Artem Dzyuba's header is off-target for Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 52, Vladimir Moskalev awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
Tonny Vilhena is replacing Yuri Gazinskiy for the away team.
Tonny Vilhena (Krasnodar) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Vladimir Moskalev blows against Saint Petersburg's Artem Dzyuba for offside.
In the minute 59, Saint Petersburg drive upfield and Douglas Santos gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Krasnodar defender.
Krasnodar will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg's Dejan Lovren gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Krasnodar defender.
In the minute 61, Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Murad Olegovich Musaev is making the team's second substitution at Gazprom Arena with Remy Cabella replacing Shapi Suleymanov.
Daniil Utkin is on a sub for Viktor Claesson for Krasnodar.
Saint Petersburg's Artem Dzyuba gets in a shot on goal at Gazprom Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a throw-in for Krasnodar, close to Saint Petersburg's area.
Saint Petersburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 64, Daler Kuzyaev grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Gazprom Arena.
Krasnodar have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
Andrey Mostovoy (Saint Petersburg) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 68, Can Saint Petersburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Krasnodar's half?
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 70, Throw-in Saint Petersburg.
Throw-in for Krasnodar at Gazprom Arena.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in the half of Krasnodar.
In the minute 73, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Kaio Pantaleao for Krasnodar who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
The home team have replaced Andrey Mostovoy with Aleksey Sutormin. This is the first substitution made today by Sergey Semak.
Krasnodar's Kaio Pantaleao is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 76, In Saint Petersburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Dejan Lovren (Saint Petersburg) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Krasnodar defenders.
Saint Petersburg drives forward and Yaroslav Rakitskiy gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 77, In Saint Petersburg, Magomed Ozdoev of Saint Petersburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Artem Dzyuba.
In the minute 79, Daler Kuzyaev with an assist there.
Krasnodar needs to be cautious. Saint Petersburg have an attacking throw-in.
The away team replace Marcus Berg with Evgeni Markov.
In the minute 82, Saint Petersburg's Daler Kuzyaev gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Magomed Ozdoev of Saint Petersburg is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 83, Krasnodar push forward at Gazprom Arena and Evgeni Chernov gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Saint Petersburg defence.
Free kick Saint Petersburg.
Kaio Pantaleao (Krasnodar) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
In the minute 86, Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
Throw-in high up the field for Krasnodar in Saint Petersburg.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 88, Saint Petersburg make their second substitution with Yuri Zhirkov replacing Wendel.
Daler Kuzyaev (Saint Petersburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Vladimir Moskalev will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Saint Petersburg are pushing forward but Aleksey Sutormin's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Krasnodar at Gazprom Arena.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
The match is over. Final score 3-1.
Daniil Krugovoy is on a sub for Daler Kuzyaev for Saint Petersburg.
Dmitri Chistyakov is replacing Yaroslav Rakitskiy for the home team.
Goal! Aleksey Sutormin extends Saint Petersburg's lead to 3-1.
Great play from Daniil Krugovoy to set up the goal.
